paragraphs.content: This know also, that in the last days perilous times shall come.
paragraphs.contentHtml: This know also, that in the last days perilous times shall come.

paragraphs.content: For men shall be lovers of their own selves, covetous, boasters, proud, blasphemers, disobedient to parents, unthankful, unholy,
paragraphs.contentHtml: For men shall be lovers of their own selves, covetous, boasters, proud, blasphemers, disobedient to parents, unthankful, unholy,

paragraphs.content: Without natural affection, trucebreakers, false accusers, incontinent, fierce, despisers of those that are good,
paragraphs.contentHtml: Without natural affection, trucebreakers, false accusers, incontinent, fierce, despisers of those that are good,

paragraphs.content: Traitors, heady, highminded, lovers of pleasures more than lovers of God;
paragraphs.contentHtml: Traitors, heady, highminded, lovers of pleasures more than lovers of God;

paragraphs.content: Having a form of godliness, but denying the power thereof: from such turn away.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Having a form of godliness, but denying the power thereof: from such turn away.

paragraphs.content: For of this sort are they which creep into houses, and lead captive silly women laden with sins, led away with divers lusts,
paragraphs.contentHtml: For of this sort are they which creep into houses, and lead captive silly women laden with sins, led away with divers lusts,

paragraphs.content: Ever learning, and never able to come to the knowledge of the truth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Ever learning, and never able to come to the knowledge of the truth.

paragraphs.content: Now as Jannes and Jambres withstood Moses, so do these also resist the truth: men of corrupt minds, reprobate concerning the faith.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Now as Jannes and Jambres withstood Moses, so do these also resist the truth: men of corrupt minds, reprobate concerning the faith.

paragraphs.content: But they shall proceed no further: for their folly shall be manifest unto all men, as theirs also was.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But they shall proceed no further: for their folly shall be manifest unto all men, as theirs also was.

paragraphs.content: But thou hast fully known my doctrine, manner of life, purpose, faith, longsuffering, charity, patience,
paragraphs.contentHtml: But thou hast fully known my doctrine, manner of life, purpose, faith, longsuffering, charity, patience,

paragraphs.content: Persecutions, afflictions, which came unto me at Antioch, at Iconium, at Lystra; what persecutions I endured: but out of them all the Lord delivered me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Persecutions, afflictions, which came unto me at Antioch, at Iconium, at Lystra; what persecutions I endured: but out of them all the Lord delivered me.

paragraphs.content: Yea, and all that will live godly in Christ Jesus shall suffer persecution.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Yea, and all that will live godly in Christ Jesus shall suffer persecution.

paragraphs.content: But evil men and seducers shall wax worse and worse, deceiving, and being deceived.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But evil men and seducers shall wax worse and worse, deceiving, and being deceived.

paragraphs.content: But continue thou in the things which thou hast learned and hast been assured of, knowing of whom thou hast learned them;
paragraphs.contentHtml: But continue thou in the things which thou hast learned and hast been assured of, knowing of whom thou hast learned them;

paragraphs.content: And that from a child thou hast known the holy scriptures, which are able to make thee wise unto salvation through faith which is in Christ Jesus.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And that from a child thou hast known the holy scriptures, which are able to make thee wise unto salvation through faith which is in Christ Jesus.

paragraphs.content: All scripture is given by inspiration of God, and is profitable for doctrine, for reproof, for correction, for instruction in righteousness:
paragraphs.contentHtml: All scripture is given by inspiration of God, and is profitable for doctrine, for reproof, for correction, for instruction in righteousness:

paragraphs.content: That the man of God may be perfect, throughly furnished unto all good works.
paragraphs.contentHtml: That the man of God may be perfect, throughly furnished unto all good works.
